query.where: RefCode = '{$temp.Master_RefCode}' AND SeqNr in (select max(seqnr) from CR_RefAddresses where refcode = '{$temp.Master_RefCode}' and AddrType in ('MA', 'BA') and CardActive =1)
RefCode = '{$temp.Master_RefCode}' AND SeqNr in (select max(seqnr) from CR_RefAddresses where refcode = '{$temp.V_Tmp_RMClients.BillAddress}' and AddrType = 'BI' and CardActive =1)
RefCode = '{$temp.Master_RefCode}' AND SeqNr in (select max(seqnr) from CR_RefAddresses where refcode = '{$temp.Master_RefCode}' and AddrType in ('RO', 'SR') and CardActive =1)

operation.expression: util:iif(fn:contains("$temp.Tmp_FullName ","!@#$%^*/?|.") or util:isNull($temp.Tmp_FullName) or fn:matches("$temp.Tmp_FullName ","[0-9]","s") or fn:string-length($temp.Tmp_FullName)<4,'Invalid',$temp.Tmp_FullName)

util:iif(fn:string-length($temp.Tmp_Fin_City )>3 or fn:contains("$temp.Tmp_Fin_City ","-","s") or fn:contains("$temp.Tmp_Fin_City "," ","s") or fn:matches("$temp.Tmp_Fin_City ","[a-z]","s"),fn:upper-case($temp.Tmp_Fin_City ),'')

util:iif(fn:string-length($temp.Tmp_Fin_County)>3 or fn:contains("$temp.Tmp_Fin_County ","-","s") or fn:contains("$temp.Tmp_Fin_County "," ","s") or fn:matches("$temp.Tmp_Fin_County ","[a-z]","s"),fn:upper-case($temp.Tmp_Fin_County ),'')

util:iif((fn:string-length($temp.Tmp_Fin_PostalCode)>2 and fn:string-length($temp.Tmp_Fin_PostalCode)<11 ) or fn:contains("$temp.Tmp_Fin_PostalCode","-","s") or fn:contains("$temp.Tmp_Fin_PostalCode"," ","s") or fn:matches("$temp.Tmp_Fin_PostalCode","[a-z]","s") or fn:matches("$temp.Tmp_Fin_PostalCode","[A-Z]","s") or fn:matches("$temp.Tmp_Fin_PostalCode","[0-9]","s"),fn:upper-case($temp.Tmp_Fin_PostalCode),'')

util:iif(fn:string-length($temp.V_Phy_City)>3 or fn:contains("$temp.V_Phy_City ","-","s") or fn:contains("$temp.V_Phy_City "," ","s") or fn:matches("$temp.V_Phy_City ","[a-z]","s"),fn:upper-case($temp.V_Phy_City ),'')

util:iif((fn:string-length($temp.V_Phy_PostalCode )>2 and fn:string-length($temp.V_Phy_PostalCode )<11 ) or fn:contains("$temp.V_Phy_PostalCode ","-","s") or fn:contains("$temp.V_Phy_PostalCode "," ","s") or fn:matches("$temp.V_Phy_PostalCode ","[a-z]","s") or fn:matches("$temp.V_Phy_PostalCode ","[A-Z]","s") or fn:matches("$temp.V_Phy_PostalCode ","[0-9]","s"),fn:upper-case($temp.V_Phy_PostalCode ),'')

util:iif(fn:string-length($temp.Tmp_Reg_City )>3 or fn:contains("$temp.Tmp_Reg_City ","-","s") or fn:contains("$temp.Tmp_Reg_City "," ","s") or fn:matches("$temp.Tmp_Reg_City ","[a-z]","s"),fn:upper-case($temp.Tmp_Reg_City ),'')

util:iif(fn:string-length($temp.Tmp_Reg_County)>3 or fn:contains("$temp.Tmp_Reg_County ","-","s") or fn:contains("$temp.Tmp_Reg_County "," ","s") or fn:matches("$temp.Tmp_Reg_County ","[a-z]","s"),fn:upper-case($temp.Tmp_Reg_County ),'')

util:iif((fn:string-length($temp.Tmp_Reg_PostalCode)>2 and fn:string-length($temp.Tmp_Reg_PostalCode)<11 ) or fn:contains("$temp.Tmp_Reg_PostalCode","-","s") or fn:contains("$temp.Tmp_Reg_PostalCode"," ","s") or fn:matches("$temp.Tmp_Reg_PostalCode","[a-z]","s") or fn:matches("$temp.Tmp_Reg_PostalCode","[A-Z]","s") or fn:matches("$temp.Tmp_Reg_PostalCode","[0-9]","s"),fn:upper-case($temp.Tmp_Reg_PostalCode),'')

util:iif(($temp.O_Phy_Street = '' or util:isNull($temp.O_Phy_Street)) and ($temp.O_Phy_City = '' or util:isNull($temp.O_Phy_City)) and ($temp.O_Phy_County = '' or util:isNull($temp.O_Phy_County)) and ($temp.O_Phy_PostalCode = '' or util:isNull($temp.O_Phy_PostalCode)) , '' , util:iif(fn:substring($temp.T_physical_address , 1, 3) = ' | ', fn:substring($temp.T_physical_address , 4, fn:string-length($temp.T_physical_address)), fn:substring($temp.T_physical_address , 1, fn:string-length($temp.T_physical_address))) )

assignment.title: Assignment to Recipient Addresses, Subject etc.

operation.expression:
fn:concat('Hi User,','
','
','Vpoint Process failed to perform load/update operation in MDM360.','
','
','Refcode Number :- ',$temp.Master_RefCode ,'
','
','Event Type :- ',$temp.Master_Eventtype ,'
','
','Error Code :- ',$output.faultInfo[1]/code ,'
','
','Error Detail :- ',$output.faultInfo[1]/detail ,'
','
', 'Error Reason :- ',$output.faultInfo[1]/reason ,'
','
','
','This is Auto-generated email. Please do not reply.','
','
','Thank You,','
','
','MDM Support Team')
